1: I receive enduring protection and rescue every day.
2: Choose just and peaceful companions for a safe life.
3: I live blameless and protected; justice stands with me.
4: Watchful help arrives and justice upholds the innocent.
5: Justice prevails with fair accountability across all nations.
6: Evening patrols circle the city, strengthening peace and safety.
7: Speak with care; every word is heard and builds peace.
8: Higher wisdom prevails over all nations.
9: I rely on mighty strength and receive steadfast protection.
10: Mercy goes before, bringing fulfillment and success.
11: Wise restraint preserves memory while protective power upholds justice.
12: Truthful, humble speech upholds justice and brings lasting honor.
13: Divine rule prevails to the ends of the earth.
14: Each evening, sentries patrol the city with watchful calls.
15: All find food and live contentedly.
16: I sing each morning of steadfast power and mercy.
17: I sing, sustained by steadfast protection and mercy.
